journal: Nuclear Instruments and Methods in Physics Research Section A: Accelerators, Spectrometers, Detectors and Associated Equipment
title: Corrigendum to “A scintillator-based detector with sub-100-μm spatial resolution comprising a fibre-optic taper with wavelength-shifting fibre readout for time-of-flight neutron imaging” [Nucl. Instrum. Methods Phys. Res. A 737 (2014) 176–183]
